meanings.definition: Adorned or crowned with laurel wreaths.
meanings.sent1: The laurelled hero proudly wore his victory wreath.
meanings.sent2: The statue of the laurelled athlete stood tall in the park.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked quite laurelled with the toilet paper stuck on its head.
meanings.sent4: The sun set behind the laurelled mountains, casting a golden glow.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the sweet scent of laurelled candles.

meanings.definition: Honored or praised with laurel wreaths.
meanings.sent1: The laurelled poet received a standing ovation for her moving words.
meanings.sent2: The laurelled students beamed with pride as they accepted their awards.
meanings.sent3: The dog felt laurelled when it found a bone buried in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The old house had a laurelled history, full of tales and secrets.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a laurelled paradise, with flowers blooming in every corner.
